actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ethics.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congressman Adam Schiff should be removed from the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence of the House and that his security clearance should be revoked immediately.
subjects: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence

summary.text:
Preventing Extreme Negligence with Classified Information Licenses Resolution or the PENCIL Resolution

This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Congressman Adam Schiff should be removed from the House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence and that his security clearance should be revoked immediately.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Congressman Adam Schiff should be removed from the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence of the House and that his security clearance should be revoked immediately.
